question: A panchayat constituted upon the dissolution of a panchayat before the expiration of its duration continues for how much time?
option1: Only for the remainder of the period for which the dissolved panchayat would have continued had it not been so dissolved
option3: Term is decided by the Governor
option4: Term is decided by the state legislature
answer: Only for the remainder of the period for which the dissolved panchayat would have continued had it not been so dissolved
explanation: A panchayat which is constituted upon the dissolution of a panchayat before the expiration of its duration continues only for the remainder of the period for which the dissolved panchayat would have continued had it not been dissolved.
